questions.question: Which new territories were added to the USA in the first half of the XIX century?

choices.answer: Louisiana, Florida, Oregon, Texas, Gadsden and California
Louisiana, Oregon, Texas, New Mexico, Gadsden.
Florida, Texas, Ontario, California, Louisiana.

questions.question: Manifest Destiny can be explained as:

choices.answer: The destiny of greatness of the choosen people among the Jews.
The idea that the USA had the right and duty to expand from ocean to ocean.
The religion that said the USA was manifested by God.

questions.question: Differences between the North and the South of the USA

choices.answer: North had a diverse economy and free workers. South had farms and slavery.
North was only about industries. South had a larger economy based on slaves
North had prohibited slavery and the South depended on it for its factories

questions.question: Many Northerners considered slavery morally valid.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: How did the election of Abraham Lincoln affected the conflict between the North and the South.

choices.answer: Southerners fiercely opposed him, he promised to stop the spread of slavery
The South was an impediment for West expansion of the USA
Southerners dislike Lincoln for being a vampire

questions.question: Southern states began to secede from the Union. These states came together as the Federate States of America

choices.answer: True
False
All slaves in the Confederate states were free.
All slaves in the South had to fight with the North and gain their freedom

choices.answer: True
